verses.roman:
bhāva-grahaṇera hetu kaila dharma-sthāpana
tāra mukhya hetu kahi, śuna sarva-jana

synonyms: bhāva-grahaṇera—of accepting the mood; hetu—the reason; kaila—did; dharma—religion; sthāpana—establishing; tāra—of that; mukhya—principal; hetu—reason; kahi—I say; śuna—please hear; sarva-jana—everyone.
translation: To accept ecstatic love is the main reason He appeared and reestablished the religious system for this age. I shall now explain that reason. Everyone please listen.
